comments.body: Consider validating the 'operation' parameter in SetOperation to ensure it is one of the valid operators before assignment.
Avoid using generic exceptions. Specify exception messages to provide more context, or create custom exceptions to improve error handling.
The recursive call to BuildTree doesn't increment the index which may lead to infinite recursion. Consider increasing the index in this case.
Add error checking for index bounds during number parsing to prevent IndexOutOfRangeException.
ExtractTreeFromFile is empty. Consider implementing or removing it if not needed.
Consider adding tests for edge cases and invalid inputs to ensure robustness.
